Token.Abstract: The PWMapViewController class provides a "canned" full featured view controller for displaying and navigating a building. It is intended to simply and minimize the effort to incorporate mapping functionality, in as few steps as possible. SDK users wishing to further customize mapping capabilities should use MPMapView.
Initiatives a new Map View Controller with a PWBuilding Object

Parameter.Name: building
Parameter.Abstract: A PWBuilding instance representing a building structure.

ReturnValue.Abstract: Returns a PWMapViewController object for the given building.

Token.Abstract: Positions the map to the supplied point of interest. The current floor with be changed as appropriate, and the POI's annotation will be popped-up.

Parameter.Name: poi
Parameter.Abstract: A PWPointOfInterest object representing any point of interest inside the building where the map should navigate to.

Token.Abstract: Starts a navigation on the building with a previously initialised PWRoute object. Displays navigation instructions on the PWMapViewController's map.

Parameter.Name: route
Parameter.Abstract: A PWRoute object representing a route to navigate on the building.

Token.Abstract: Sets and dislays the current navitation instruction/steps during a navigation.

Parameter.Name: instruction
Parameter.Abstract: A route instruction object for the route.

Token.Abstract: Positions the map to the supplied center coordinate with the given zoom level and optional animation.

Parameter.Name: centerCoordinate
Parameter.Abstract: A CLLocationCoordinate2D object representing the latitude an longitude the map should zoom to.

Parameter.Name: zoomLevel
Parameter.Abstract: A NSUInteger value representing zoom level the map should zoom to.

Parameter.Name: animated
Parameter.Abstract: A BOOL property to determine whether the change of map's center should be animated or not.
